_header: A man there was in Israel while by daw
Subjects: Virgin Mary, Conception of; Joachim and Anna, parents of the Virgin Mary
_description: The Conception of Mary, in one MS of the South English Legendary — in couplets

CamTCC605.First Lines:
A man þer was in israel wyle by daweIoachym was his name by
                    for þe nywe lawe…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…howe we mowe al yfare þe lorde with þoute ende&
                    bydde we þat to heuene blis þat we mote wende
CamTCC605.Note: Lines 592-686 fragmentary due to vertical tearing, f. 268.
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
